resources.string: Please fill out the following information then click next. To exit at any time just click exit.
Prep Time (rounded to the nearest whole minute)
Cook Time (rounded to the nearest whole minute)
Optional: Select items from drop down list
Please enter the necessary equipment to create the recipe. Keep clicking add new equipment until all items have been added, then click next
Please enter the ingredient names and amounts. Keep clicking add new ingredient until all ingridents have been added, then click next
Ingredient Amount. Please use the drop down to select the unit of measurement
Please enter the steps for the recipe one at a time. To add the next step click add new step, when all the steps have been added click next
Would you like to enter allergen information about the recipe?
Does this recipe contain Diary (Milk, Cheese)?
Please enter the following information about food allergies. Enter Yes or No, then click Create My Recipe
To access Recipes, Shopping List, or Favorites click on the icon at the top left (has three bars) then click on the name of whichever one you would like to view.
To Create A Recipe: click on Recipes. Once in Recipes click on "Add Recipe" which is located in the upper right corner.
To Delete A Recipe: click on Recipes. Click on the recipe name, once inside the actual recipe click "Delete" which is located in the upper right corner.
To Add a Recipe To Favorites: click on the star next to the recip name, when the star is yellow the recipe has been added to favorites.
To Remove a Recipe From Favorites: click on the yellow star next to the recipe name, when the star is not filled with a color the recipe has been removed from favorites.

To Add to Shopping List: click on Shopping List, at the bottom of the page click on edit. Or while inside a recipe click on "SHopList" in the upper bar to add the recipe's ingredients to the Shopping List.
To Cook a Recipe: click on the "Cook" button while in the recipe and it will walk you through the recipe step by step.
For further information or questions/comments please send an email to: mealdesignerapp@gmail.com
